title: Find smallest element in a matrix
contentHtml:
Write a program to find smallest element in a matrix

Input :
4 7 3
9 4 2
0 6 4

Output : 0

const FindSmallestElementInAMatrix = (matrix: number[][]): number =>{
let currSmall: number = matrix[0][0]
 matrix.forEach(arr =>{
    if(currSmall > Math.min(...arr)){
        currSmall = Math.min(...arr)
    }
})
return currSmall
}

FindSmallestElementInAMatrix([[1,2,3],[4,5,6],[7,8,9]])

console.log(FindSmallestElementInAMatrix([[1,2,3],[4,5,6],[7,8,9]]))
console.log(FindSmallestElementInAMatrix([[9,8,7],[6,5,4],[3,2,1]]))
console.log(FindSmallestElementInAMatrix([[10,222,43],[0,15,336],[437,854,49]]))
